Delhi.title: Delhi
Delhi.question: What is the capital of India?
Delhi.description: Delhi is one of the oldest cities in the world, rich in history and culture.
Delhi.details: It is the capital territory of India and includes New Delhi, the seat of all three branches of the government of India.

Mexico.title: Mexico
Mexico.question: Which country is known for ancient Aztec and Mayan civilizations?
Mexico.description: Mexico is a country in the southern portion of North America, rich in history, culture, and biodiversity.
Mexico.details: Itâ€™s known for its vibrant traditions, cuisine, and ancient ruins like Chichen Itza and Teotihuacan.
